On a roll of 4, you teleport 30 feet in a random direction. Once you regain a spell slot in this way, this property can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Talisman of the Phoenix
entries: This talisman has {@dice 1d4} charges. Whenever you fail a {@variantrule Death Saving Throw|XPHB} while the talisman is on your person, you can choose to expend a charge to succeed instead. Once all of the talisman's charges have been used, it burns up in a flash, leaving behind a pile of ashes. It then reforms with {@dice 1d4} charges somewhere else on the same plane of existence.

item.name: Yappa Mask
entries: While wearing the Yappa Mask, your creature type is Spirit. In addition, you know Torum, the Spirit language.

item.name: Rabbit's Speed
entries: Within seconds of downing this potion, you feel a distinct lightness and spring in your step. Your {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} increases by 5 feet for the next 10 minutes.
{@font {@style 1|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Weapon Master's Elixir
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain a sense of clarity and focus. The swing of a certain weapon becomes second nature to you. For the next 24 hours, you have proficiency with a Melee weapon of your choice.
{@font {@style 2|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Spirit of Salyri
entries: This potion is said to contain the spirit of Salyri, a great Obojiman warrior known for her fighting prowess. Anyone who drinks this potion gains a certain understanding of how to effectively wear armor in combat. For the next 24 hours, you have training with {@item Shield|XPHB|Shields} or one type of armor of your choice.
{@font {@style 3|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Beast Hide
entries: Drinking this potion thickens your skin and grows patches of fur all around your body. Frost that would normally freeze your skin instead melts on contact. For 1 minute, you have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Cold damage.
{@font {@style 4|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Spirit Armor
entries: When poured on a creature that isn't wearing armor, this potion covers the target with a magical force. For the next hour, the target has an {@variantrule Armor Class|XPHB} of 15 if its AC is lower than that. This effect ends early if the target dons armor.
{@font {@style 5|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Displacement Field
entries: Drinking this silvery, glittering potion causes you to shimmer and flicker, making you appear to be standing next to your actual location. Until the start of your next turn, all attack rolls against you are made with {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}.
{@font {@style 6|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Shepherd's Bane
entries: It is said that this potion was first brewed in the Gale Fields by a young shepherd looking to protect their flock. The irony was not lost on them when they drank the potion and took on wolflike features. When you drink this potion, you grow claws which last for 1 hour. For the duration, when you use your {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|XPHB} to deal damage with the claws, they deal Slashing damage equal to {@dice 1d6} plus your Strength modifier instead of dealing the normal damage for your {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|XPHB}.
{@font {@style 7|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Bottled Bomb
entries: When thrown at a point you can see within 60 feet of you, this volatile liquid explodes. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 1d8} Force damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
{@font {@style 8|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Wonder Juice
entries: When you drink this multicolored potion, you instantly feel magical. For 1 minute, everything you are wearing or carrying is considered magical, and your weapons and {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|XPHB|Unarmed Strikes} deal Force damage instead of their normal type.
{@font {@style 9|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Candlecap
entries: After imbibing this potion, you gain lively flaming locks, which last for 1 hour and shed {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} in a 20-foot radius and {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} for an additional 20 feet. Once on each of your turns for the duration, you can cause an {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|XPHB} made with your head to deal an extra {@damage 1d4} Fire damage. Additionally, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to cause the flame on your head to burst outward, dealing {@damage 2d4} Fire damage to each creature (other than you) in a 5-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from you; doing so causes the effects of this potion to end early.
{@font {@style 10|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Eagle's Vision
entries: When you drink this potion, your eyes grow slightly larger and turn the golden color of an eagle. For the next minute, attacking at long range doesn't impose {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on your ranged attack rolls with weapons.
{@font {@style 11|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Paranoia
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain heightened senses along with the sneaking suspicion that you are being stalked. For the next 8 hours, you can't be {@status surprised|XPHB}.
{@font {@style 12|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Bottled Torch
entries: When uncorked, this potion spews a hot, yellow flame from its bottle for 1 minute, which resembles the shape of a blade. For the duration, you can attack with the fiery blade, which counts as a Simple Melee weapon. It deals {@damage 2d4} Fire damage on a hit and has the {@itemProperty F|XPHB|Finesse} property. The blade disappears early if it is submerged in water.
{@font {@style 13|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Static Shock
entries: This potion makes you feel tingly as it charges you up with static electricity. Immediately after a creature touches you or hits you with a melee attack using a metal weapon in the next 24 hours, you can take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to send a charge of static electricity back at that creature, dealing {@damage 1d10} Lightning damage to it. Once you do so, the effects of this potion end.
{@font {@style 14|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Incoming!
entries: Upon drinking this potion, you become hyperaware of threats from afar and your reflexes snap into action, empowering you to slip out of harm's way or knock missiles aside. For 1 minute, you gain a +2 bonus to AC against ranged attack rolls.
{@font {@style 15|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Lightning Breath
entries: After drinking this shimmering gold liquid, your voice gains a crackling quality and your breath sparks and sputters for 24 hours. For the duration, you can take a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} to exhale an arc of lightning at a creature you can see within 30 feet of you. The target must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 1d10} Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. Once you exhale this lightning, the effects of this potion end.
{@font {@style 16|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Heroism
entries: When you drink this glowing red elixir, you gain {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on the next attack roll you make within the next 24 hours.
{@font {@style 17|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Slugskin
entries: Drinking this potion makes your skin thick, slippery, and rubbery. For 1 minute, you have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Piercing damage. While the potion is active, you can choose to exude a slime trail as part of your movement.
{@font {@style 18|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Thunderbelch
entries: Upon ingesting this fiercely fizzing potion, roll a {@dice d4} to determine the number of rounds before you let forth a thunderous belch of epic proportions. On your turn that round, you must use your action to release the belch; if you have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition or otherwise can't take an action at that time, the potion's magic fades with no effect. Each creature other than you in a 10-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from you must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 3d8} Thunder damage and has the {@condition Deafened|XPHB} condition until the end of your next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.
{@font {@style 19|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Seeking Smoke
entries: When thrown at a creature that you can see within 30 feet of you, this shimmering liquid explodes, releasing a billowing cloud of smoke. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be coated in a cloak of smoke for 1 minute. For the duration, the target has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth|XPHB}) checks.
{@font {@style 20|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Dancing Juice
entries: You can coat one Melee weapon with this potion. For 1 hour, you can force a creature you hit with the coated weapon to make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the weapon is no longer coated in this potion, and the target begins to convulse in a manner that could be mistaken for an awkward, clumsy series of dance steps. Until the end of its next turn, the target's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is reduced to 0, after which this effect ends.
{@font {@style 21|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Prickleskin
entries: Drinking this potion causes spines to emerge all over your body, which remain for 1 minute. These spines lay flat but can be controlled by you to stand on end. For the duration, whenever you successfully grapple a creature and as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on your subsequent turns while it remains {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by you, you can deal {@damage 1d4} Piercing damage to the target.
{@font {@style 22|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Tiny Bubbles
entries: Drinking this pink, bitter-tasting potion causes hundreds of small, iridescent bubbles to emerge from your nose and mouth and fill a 20-foot {@variantrule Cube [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cube} that you can see within 30 feet of you. If the bubbles are left untouched, they float in place, remaining there for 1 hour. When a creature enters a space occupied by the bubbles for the first time on a turn, it must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a cacophony of popping erupts as the bubbles burst, dealing {@damage 1d6} Thunder damage to each creature inside the {@variantrule Cube [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cube}. The sound of the bubbles popping can be heard from a mile away.
{@font {@style 23|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Claws of the Crab King
entries: Your hands turn into a handsome set of powerful crab claws for 1 minute. For the duration, when you use your {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|XPHB} to deal damage with the claws, they deal Slashing damage equal to {@dice 1d4} plus your Strength modifier instead of dealing the normal damage for your {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|XPHB}; these attacks deal double damage to objects and structures. In addition, you have a +2 bonus to your grapple's escape DC using the claws. The claws can't wield weapons or {@item Shield|XPHB|Shields} or do anything that requires manual precision, such as using tools or magic items or performing the Somatic components of a spell.
{@font {@style 24|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Rubberskin
entries: When you drink this blue goo, your skin turns into a thick, gray rubber. For 1 hour, you have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Lightning damage.
{@font {@style 25|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Keening Voice
entries: When you open this potion, a keening wail comes out of the bottle. Drinking this potion gives your vocal cords a magical resonance for 1 hour. For the duration, you can use a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} to make a ranged attack roll against a creature within 60 feet of you, using your Charisma ({@skill Performance|XPHB}) bonus for the attack bonus; the attack automatically misses if the target can't hear you. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6} Thunder damage.
{@font {@style 26|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Kinetic Pop
entries: When poured over a nonmagical weapon, this potion fills the mundane item with kinetic energy, causing it to vibrate with anticipation. The next time you hit a creature with the weapon, the energy explodes, doubling the damage rolled by the weapon's damage dice. The effects of this potion last for 1 hour or until the energy explodes.
{@font {@style 27|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Healing Gas
entries: When thrown at a point you can see within 60 feet of you, this volatile liquid explodes, releasing a crimson ball of gas. Each creature within 5 feet of that point regains {@dice 1d4 + 1} {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.
{@font {@style 28|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Cinderskin
entries: When you drink this bubbling, black potion, your skin becomes encrusted with charcoal. For 1 hour, you have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Fire damage.
{@font {@style 29|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Iron Mind
entries: After imbibing this elixir, your eyes glow with a silvery-blue hue. For 1 hour, you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws you make to avoid or end the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition, and you have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Psychic damage.
{@font {@style 30|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Gargoyle Hooch
entries: This gray liquid tastes like mud and makes your tongue numb. Within seconds of swallowing the potion, your skin turns to living stone, giving you a +2 bonus to AC and reducing your {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} by 5 feet. The effects of this potion last for 1 hour, unless removed by a spell of level 5 or higher as if it were a curse.
{@font {@style 31|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Elixir of Jipampa
entries: When you drink this potion, you can feel your nervous system gain a boost of furtive energy from the rabbit spirit, Jipampa. Your pupils dilate and your reflexes become enhanced. For the next 24 hours, you gain a +5 bonus to {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} rolls. Additionally, if a trigger would allow you to take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB}, but you have already taken your {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} this round, you can choose to take a second {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB}; doing so causes the effects of this potion to end early.
{@font {@style 32|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Catspeed
entries: When you drink this potion, you are overwhelmed by a warm, lethargic sensation akin to a blanket pulled over an intense ball of energy you feel swirling inside of you. Once within the next 24 hours when you take the {@action Attack|XPHB} action, you can make two additional attacks as part of that action. Once you do so, the effects of this potion end. While the potion is active, you gain the ability to purr like a cat.
{@font {@style 33|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Durability
entries: When you drink this potion, your skin becomes as tough as thick leather that, for a short time, repairs itself. For 1 minute, you gain 10 {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of each of your turns.
{@font {@style 34|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Fire Shield
entries: This potion burns like a hot tamale when you drink it and fills you with fiery strength. The next time you are subjected to Fire damage, you take no damage and instead regain a number of {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to half the Fire damage dealt. The effects of this potion last for 24 hours or until you regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} in this way.
{@font {@style 35|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Tunnel Vision
entries: Drinking this potion causes you to hyperfixate on your strikes, but potentially opens you to counterattacks. For the next minute, the first time you hit a target with an attack roll using a weapon or an {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|XPHB} on each of your turns, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d12} damage of the same type. Until the potion's effects end, you also take a -2 penalty to AC.
{@font {@style 36|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Ratatam's Glowskin Elixir
entries: Upon drinking, your skin begins to shed {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} in a 10-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from you. As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, you can choose to intensify this light—shedding {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} in a 10-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} and {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} for an additional 10 feet—or diminish the light again. You can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to produce a blinding flare around you. Each creature that can see you (other than you) in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from you must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or have the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition for 1 minute. Affected creatures can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. The effects of this potion last for 8 hours, until you use the flare, or is removed by a spell of level 5 or higher, as if it were a curse.
{@font {@style 37|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Don't Hit Me Juice
entries: When thrown at a creature you can see within 30 feet of you, this bright pink elixir breaks, covering the creature in juice. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or have the {@condition Pacified|ObojimaTallGrass24} condition for 1 minute. A {@condition Pacified|ObojimaTallGrass24} creature can't attack, cast a spell that affects an enemy, or deal damage to another creature. The target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
{@font {@style 38|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Invulnerability
entries: When you open this potion, it bursts forth with a symphonic fanfare. Until the start of your next turn, you have {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to all damage. On your next turn, you can't move or take actions, as a wave of lethargy sweeps over you.
{@font {@style 39|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Bottled Bind
entries: When thrown at a creature you can see within 30 feet of you, this thick mudlike potion breaks, covering the creature in tacky glue. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or have the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition for 1 minute or until it escapes. To escape, the target or a creature within 5 feet of it must take an action to make a DC 15 Strength ({@skill Athletics|XPHB}) check, freeing the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} creature on a success.
{@font {@style 40|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Respiratory Distress
entries: This potion reacts instantly when exposed to air, rapidly expanding into a cloud of irritating gas. You can throw it at a point you can see within 60 feet of you, causing it to break open and release the cloud in a 15-foot-radius {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} centered on that point. Each creature within the cloud when it appears must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature spends its {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} coughing and snorting, and it loses {@status Concentration|XPHB}.
{@font {@style 41|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Pumpkin Patch Guard
entries: When consumed, this warming harvest beverage transforms your head into a jack-o'-lantern. From your newly formed eyes you cast a beam of glowing light for 1 minute, which causes creatures in a 15-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone} to be under the effects of the {@spell Faerie Fire|XPHB} spell. At the start of each of your turns for the duration, you decide whether the {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone} is active and which direction it faces.
{@font {@style 42|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Sheep Dragon Brew
entries: One swig of this hearty potion will see you growing a thick coat of sheep dragon wool all around your body. Besides keeping you warm, it aids your survival and protects you from the cold. For the duration your AC increases by 1, and you gain {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to cold damage. The effects of this potion last for 1 hour.
{@font {@style 43|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Enhanced Static Shock
entries: This potion makes you feel tingly as it charges you up with static electricity. Immediately after a creature touches you or hits you with a melee attack using a metal weapon in the next 24 hours, you can take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to send a charge of static electricity back at that creature, dealing {@damage 3d10} Lightning damage to it. Once you do so, the effects of this potion end.
{@font {@style 44|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Enhanced Lightning Breath
entries: After drinking this shimmering gold liquid, your voice gains a crackling quality and your breath sparks and sputters for 24 hours. For the duration, you can take a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} to exhale an arc of lightning at a creature you can see within 30 feet of you. The target must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 3d10} Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. Once you exhale this lightning, the effects of this potion end.
{@font {@style 45|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Enhanced Bottled Bomb
entries: When thrown at a point you can see within 60 feet of you, this volatile liquid explodes. Each creature within 15 feet of that point must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 3d8} Force damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
{@font {@style 46|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Wrathful Spirit
entries: When consumed, the essence of a long-dead spirit overwhelms you. You feel on edge and have an undertone of rage that boils below the surface. Roll {@dice 2d8} and record the total. For the next minute, whenever you cast a spell, you can cause one target that took damage from it to take extra Force damage equal to the recorded number.
{@font {@style 47|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Rapid Withdrawal
entries: When you drink this potion, motes of pink light erupt from your body and orbit around you for 1 minute. For the duration, whenever you take damage from an enemy, you can take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to teleport up to 15 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.
{@font {@style 48|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Life-Steal
entries: This dangerous and disliked potion transforms when used. As a {@action Magic|XPHB} action, you can uncork the potion and point it toward a creature you can see within 10 feet of you. The target takes {@damage 3d6} Necrotic damage, and the potion transforms into a healing elixir. A creature that consumes this elixir regains a number of {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the Necrotic damage dealt.
{@font {@style 49|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Demonskin
entries: Uncorking this potion, you are immediately assaulted with a powerfully pungent, acrid odor. Once you drink it, your skin takes on a glowing burgundy hue and your eyes turn a sickly crimson for 1 minute. For the duration, you gain a +2 bonus to AC, and you have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Bludgeoning, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Piercing, and Slashing damage. Until the effects of this potion end, your creature type changes to Demon (Fiend).
{@font {@style 50|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Withered Will
entries: After drinking this light and dewy potion, you gain the ability to expel withering vapor. For the next minute, you can take a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} to exhale a cloud in a 60-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is halved, it can't take {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB|Reactions}, and it has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls until the start of your next turn. Once you exhale this cloud, roll a {@dice d6} at the start of each of your turns. You can't exhale the cloud again until you roll a 4-6 on the die.
{@font {@style 51|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Astounding Vigor
entries: When you drink this hearty potion, you feel the strongest and healthiest you've ever felt. You gain a number of {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} equal to your {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} maximum.
{@font {@style 52|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Many Hands
entries: When you drink this potion you can call upon an ancient and devious spirit known as Many Hands. When you do, a host of long, spindly, spectral arms reach out from your body. Each creature (other than you) who can see you when the hands first emerge must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or have the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the start of your next turn; your allies have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on this save. Additionally, the arms lash out from you, clawing at creatures in a 20-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from you. Make a single melee spell attack, using an attack bonus of +11, which targets each creature (other than you) in that area. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 10d6} Necrotic damage and can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} until the start of your next turn. On a miss, the creature takes half as much damage only.
{@font {@style 53|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Epic Bottled Bomb
entries: When thrown at a point you can see within 60 feet of you, this volatile liquid explodes. Each creature within 30 feet of that point must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 20d6} Force damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
{@font {@style 54|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Essence of Great Rivers
entries: This crystal clear potion captures the essence of the four great river spirits Mu, Go, Yon, and Din. Consuming it allows you to call on their strength to aid you. Whenever you fail a saving throw, you can choose to succeed instead. The effects of this potion last for 24 hours or until you have changed a failed save into a successful one three times.
{@font {@style 55|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Carla Cackletooth's Corruption Cocktail
entries: This potion was invented by none other than the legendary Carla Cackletooth, a witch of considerable potion-making prowess. When poured out, it summons 10 {@creature Corrupted Muk|ObojimaTallGrass24|Corrupted Muks} in the nearest unoccupied spaces, which are at your beck and call and under your control until destroyed.
{@font {@style 56|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Hunter's Speed
entries: When this amber potion is consumed, you gain the attributes of the {@creature The Hunter|ObojimaTallGrass24|Hunter}, one of the great beasts of Obojima. Roll a {@dice d4}. For the next minute, you gain a {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} of 90 feet; and whenever you take the {@action Attack|XPHB} action, you can make an additional number of attacks equal to 1 plus the number rolled on the {@dice d4}.
{@font {@style 57|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Hero's Blade
entries: When poured over a weapon, this heroic elixir stains it blue and causes it to shimmer as if it were a gemstone reflecting light. For the next minute, the weapon gains a +3 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls. Until this effect ends, creatures hit by the weapon don't benefit from any Damage {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB|Immunities} or {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB|Resistances} they have for 1 minute.
{@font {@style 58|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Severed Reaction
entries: Consuming this foggy brew gives you a headache you can never quite alleviate. While under the effects of this potion, you can take two {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB|Reactions} each round instead of one. Each time you take a second {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB}, you lose a number of {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to half your level (round down). The effects of this potion are {@b Permanent}.
{@font {@style 59|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Dragon Frog Transmutation
entries: After guzzling down this froggy potion, you turn into an {@creature Elder Dragon Frog|ObojimaTallGrass24}, as if by the {@spell True Polymorph|XPHB} spell. This transformation lasts for 1 minute, or 10 minutes if a {@item Dragon Fang of Yutro|ObojimaTallGrass24} was used when brewing this potion.
{@font {@style 60|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Sensorius Maximus
entries: This effervescent green potion tastes like an old sock. When imbibed, it heightens all the senses with an expansive, almost euphoric feeling. For the next hour, you gain a +3 bonus to Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks.
{@font {@style 1|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Flip & Skip
entries: This blue potion sparkles and fizzes when opened and makes your tongue tingle when imbibed. For the next hour, you gain a +3 bonus to Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics|XPHB}) checks.
{@font {@style 2|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Brute Brew
entries: Drinking this brownish broth fills your sinews with ogreish power. For the next hour, you gain a +3 bonus to Strength ({@skill Athletics|XPHB}) checks.
{@font {@style 3|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Animal Affinity
entries: This potion has a violet color and smells like a spring meadow. When you drink it, you become very calm and are able to sense subtle cues from all kinds of animals. For the next hour, you gain a +3 bonus to Wisdom ({@skill Animal Handling|XPHB}) checks.
{@font {@style 4|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Detective's Tonic
entries: This subtle, bourbon-flavored potion burns when consumed. For the next hour, you gain a +3 bonus to Intelligence ({@skill Investigation|XPHB}) checks.
{@font {@style 5|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Cave Diver
entries: When this potion is poured on your hands and feet, they temporarily become stained with a deep indigo color. For the next 10 minutes, you gain the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and along ceilings, while leaving your hands free. You also gain a {@variantrule Climb Speed|XPHB} equal to your {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}.
{@font {@style 6|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Perfect Memory
entries: For 1 hour after drinking this potion, everything you see and hear is recorded perfectly in your memory. You can recall these memories up to 24 hours later. After that, all the memories begin to fade with only the most memorable parts remaining.
{@font {@style 7|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Eyes of Akibu
entries: When this potion is poured over your eyes, your long-range vision enhances. For 4 hours, you can see up to 300 feet away as if looking at something one-tenth as far away from you.
{@font {@style 8|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Glowskin
entries: Ironically, glowskin potions are jet black in color until shaken. After drinking this potion, your skin sheds {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} and {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} for an additional 30 feet. The effects of this potion last for 4 hours, unless removed as if it were a curse.
{@font {@style 9|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Tiny Telekinesis
entries: When you drink this potion, you feel a slight pressure behind your eyes as though something is pushing on the inside of your skull trying to get out. For the next minute, you gain the ability to move inanimate objects with your mind. As a {@action Magic|XPHB} action, you can choose an inanimate object you can see within 60 feet of you that isn't being worn or carried and move it up to 30 feet in any direction. The object can be no larger than 5 inches in diameter, and it can't weigh more than 1 pound. You can't move the object more than 60 feet away from you in this way.
{@font {@style 10|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Irresistible Charm
entries: Once imbibed, a tingling sensation builds within you, bubbling up into a giddy euphoria of confident charm. For the next 10 minutes, you gain {@variantrule Expertise|XPHB} in the {@skill Persuasion|XPHB} skill.
{@font {@style 11|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Pathseeking
entries: This potion is brewed for the specific task of detecting tracks left by a {@item Secret Path|ObojimaTallGrass24} potion. For 1 hour after drinking it, such tracks appear to you as glowing footprints made with uncanny detail. You can also see into the Spirit Realm (Ethereal Plane) for the duration.
{@font {@style 12|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Iron Belly
entries: Legend has it that Obojiman rangers would use this potion during long treks in the wilderness so they could eat unknown roots and fungi, as well as drink from lakes and lowland streams, without fear of illness. When imbibed, you gain 5 {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}, and you have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Poison damage for 1 hour.
{@font {@style 13|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Face of Fugari
entries: Fugari is a figure of legend, a dragon frog who would glower at his subjects, filling them with dread at being swallowed whole. Drinking this potion gives you a grim, bullfroggish demeanor which strikes fear into those who view you. For the next minute, you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Charisma ({@skill Intimidation|XPHB}) checks.
{@font {@style 14|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Duck Foot
entries: When you drink this brackish-smelling potion, your hands and feet begin to tingle. Within seconds, they turn a bright orange and become webbed like a mallard's feet. For the next hour, you gain a {@variantrule Swim Speed|XPHB} of 40 feet and are able to make a very convincing quacking sound.
{@font {@style 15|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Potion of Fog
entries: When you drink this potion, a billow of thick fog pours from your mouth, which fills a 20-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from you. The fog's area is {@variantrule Heavily Obscured|XPHB}. It lasts for 1 hour or until a strong wind (such as one created by {@spell Gust of Wind|XPHB}) disperses it. As a {@action Magic|XPHB} action, you can expel all remaining fog from your stomach, causing it to remain centered on that space for the duration. The fog produces a scent of your choice.
{@font {@style 16|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Secret Path
entries: When this potion is applied to a pair of boots, it allows their wearer to leave a trail of magical tracks that are {@condition invisible} to the naked eye. When brewed, the creator of this potion chooses the color of the tracks. This trail is only visible to a creature that can see {@condition invisible} objects (such as one benefiting from {@spell See Invisibility|XPHB} or {@spell Truesight|XPHB}) or one that is under the effects of a {@item Pathseeking|ObojimaTallGrass24} potion. The boots can leave tracks in this way for the next 24 hours, and the tracks last for 30 days before vanishing.
{@font {@style 17|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Grandma's Turnip Soup
entries: This potion tastes like a soup made with love. When you consume it during a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB}, you can roll {@dice 1d4} {@variantrule Hit Point Dice|XPHB|Hit Dice} (adding your Constitution modifier to each and regaining {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the total) without expending them.
{@font {@style 18|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Herbalist's Aid
entries: Drinking this highly sought-after potion grants you a unique sense helpful for detecting ingredients. For the next hour, you gain a +3 bonus to all ability checks made to locate an ingredient.
{@font {@style 19|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Homeward Tonic
entries: This fiery red elixir smells of home and drinking it gives a sensation of comfort when consumed. For the next 24 hours, you always know the direction of the place you consider home, provided it is on the same plane of existence.
{@font {@style 20|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Soft Paw
entries: When consumed, this licorice-flavored potion turns your hands and feet into fur-covered paws. For the next 10 minutes, you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Dexterity checks.
{@font {@style 21|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Potion of Healing Touch
entries: When this glowing blue potion is poured on your hands, it gives you the ability to heal. As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, you can touch a creature, causing it to regain {@dice 2d4} {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. The effects of this potion last for 1 hour or until you heal a creature in this way.
{@font {@style 22|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Cat's Eye
entries: When you imbibe this potion, your eyes become catlike, and you can choose their color. For the next hour, you have {@sense Darkvision|XPHB} with a range of 60 feet. If you already have {@sense Darkvision|XPHB} from another source, its range increases by 30 feet.
{@font {@style 23|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Liquid Mending
entries: Also known as "craftsman in a bottle," this well-loved potion is found in most homes and shops. You can pour this potion over an object to repair a single break or tear in it, as if by the {@spell Mending|XPHB} cantrip.
{@font {@style 24|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Liquid Lockpick
entries: Although frowned upon in many villages, this useful potion is still sought after by many islanders for both wholesome and nefarious reasons. You can pour the potion into a lock, loosening the mechanism inside and decreasing the DC to pick it by {@dice 1d4} for the next hour. While a lock's DC is reduced by this potion, its DC can't be reduced again by another Liquid Lockpick potion.
{@font {@style 25|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Language Lore
entries: This grayish potion tastes like chewed up paper. For 1 hour after drinking it, you understand the literal meaning of any language that you hear or see signed.
{@font {@style 26|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Pig Snout
entries: After drinking this pink pastel potion, you experience an uncomfortable but brief transformation, growing a beautiful, snuffling pig snout. For the next hour, you become very fond of truffles, perhaps even to the point of belligerence, and you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on smell.
{@font {@style 27|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Machine Oil
entries: When poured over a machine that is in working condition, this dark black liquid powers up the device, allowing it to function as if it were whelmed by a spirit or activated by the {@spell Jolt|ObojimaTallGrass24} cantrip. The machine stays powered by this potion for 1 minute.
{@font {@style 28|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Potion of Soft Steps
entries: When you drink this frothy brew, you float an inch off the ground and walk on a cushion of air. For the next 10 minutes, you gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity ({@skill Stealth|XPHB}) checks, and you leave no discernible tracks.
{@font {@style 29|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Liquid Cat
entries: This lively, swirling concoction transforms and solidifies into a friendly cat when poured out. The cat serves you as a familiar, as if from the {@spell Find Familiar|XPHB} spell. The cat disappears after 24 hours.
{@font {@style 30|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Twin Vision
entries: This potion must be shared with another creature, each of them ingesting half of the potion. When the second half of the potion is consumed, the creature that consumed the first half gains the ability to see through the eyes of the second creature for the next 8 hours. While under this effect, it gains the benefits of any special senses the second creature has. This benefit can’t be used if the creatures are more than 1 mile apart. While seeing in this way, the first creature is blind with regard to its own senses. Either creature can use its action to stop the shared vision or reactivate it.
{@font {@style 31|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Spirit Repellent
entries: This potion causes the nearby area to become repulsive to spirits. The source of the potion's effect is either you (if you imbibe it) or a 1-foot square within your reach (if you pour it out), and its effect lasts for 1 minute. When you use this potion, any Spirit within 30 feet of the source must make a DC 15 Charisma saving throw; a Spirit has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on this save if it has a {@variantrule Challenge Rating|XPHB} of 6 or higher. On a failed save, the spirit is teleported to a random unoccupied space that is at least 35 feet away from the source (but not through {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover}), and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of the source until the effect of this potion ends. A spirit that hasn't made this save must immediately do so if it moves to a space within 30 feet of the source before the effect ends, being subjected to the effect on a failed save.
{@font {@style 32|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Essence of the River Spirit
entries: This small, stoppered vial contains a clear liquid that shimmers with a faint blue light. When the vial is opened, you can pour the liquid into a small pool of water (such as a bath or hot spring), transforming it into a healing pool. A creature that soaks in the pool for at least 10 minutes regains {@dice 4d4 + 4} {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. The pool loses its magic after 1 hour or once six creatures have benefited from this effect.
{@font {@style 33|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Potion of Freezing
entries: Pouring this grayish-blue potion into any liquid will cause that liquid to freeze solid for 1 hour, after which it begins to thaw as normal. This effect can freeze no more than a 20-foot {@variantrule Cube [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cube} of liquid.
{@font {@style 34|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Potion of Attunement
entries: As a {@action Magic|XPHB} action, you can pour a drop of this potion onto a magic item that requires {@variantrule Attunement|XPHB} and drink the rest. Once you do so, you instantly become attuned to that item.
{@font {@style 35|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Water Breathing
entries: This tropical fruity elixir tastes just as delicious as your favorite juice. For 1 hour after drinking it, you can breathe underwater.
{@font {@style 36|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Liquid Dispel
entries: When thrown at a creature, object, or magical effect within 30 feet of you, this potion breaks, releasing its contents on the target. Any ongoing spell of level 3 or lower on the target immediately ends.
{@font {@style 37|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Pocket Stomach
entries: When imbibed, your stomach temporarily functions as a {@item Bag of Holding|XPHB}, allowing you to store any object you can fit in your mouth inside its extradimensional space. The effects of this potion last for 1 hour, after which you throw up anything consumed.
{@font {@style 38|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Liquid Arcana
entries: When brewed, the creator of this potion rolls a {@dice d4} to determine the maximum level of the spell slot it can restore. When you drink it, you immediately regain your highest-level expended spell slot of the rolled level or lower.
{@font {@style 39|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Arcane Solvent
entries: When this potion is applied to a magic item, any creature that was attuned to it is no longer attuned. If the item is being worn or carried by the attuned creature, that creature can resist the effects of this potion with a successful DC 13 Charisma saving throw.
{@font {@style 40|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Gardener's Solution
entries: When this oily, greenish potion is rubbed on a plant, the plant instantly grows to full maturity. If the plant is too big for the space—such as a redwood tree—it will stop growing once it has reasonably filled the space. If you imbibe the potion, it has no effect, but it tastes like maple syrup.
{@font {@style 41|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Potion of Exertion
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain a surge of manic energy. You can take another action this round at {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} count 0.
{@font {@style 42|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Breakfast in a Bottle
entries: When brewed, the creator of this potion rolls a {@dice d4} to determine the number of servings it creates. When it's poured out, this liquid quickly forms into an appetizing breakfast, such as some bread or pancakes. A creature that consumes one serving of it feels satiated for the day, and its {@condition Exhaustion|XPHB} level decreases by 1. It takes 1 minute to consume one serving, and once a creature benefits from this effect, it can't do so again until it finishes a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. The food spoils after 24 hours, losing its magic.
{@font {@style 43|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Twin Telepathy
entries: This potion must be shared with another creature, each of them ingesting half of the potion. Once the second half of the potion is consumed, the imbibers can communicate telepathically across any distance, including between different planes of existence, for the next 24 hours.
{@font {@style 44|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Potion of Reprieve
entries: When imbibed, this potion offers temporary relief from an ill effect, allowing you to gain one benefit of your choice from the {@spell Greater Restoration|XPHB} spell. After 1 hour, you lose the chosen benefit, causing the ill effect to return.
{@font {@style 45|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Uncanny Focus
entries: This purplish liquid smells of ammonia. For 1 minute after drinking it, you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Constitution saving throws made to maintain {@status Concentration|XPHB}, and your {@status Concentration|XPHB} doesn't end as a result of having the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.
{@font {@style 46|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Meditative Trance
entries: This violet-colored potion smells like lavender and citrus. The next time you take a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB} after ingesting it, you enjoy a deep, dreamless sleep. When you finish the rest, you gain the benefits of a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}, even if you already benefited from a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB} in the past 24 hours.
{@font {@style 47|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Potion of Holistic Wellness
entries: When you uncork this potion of scintillating liquid, your senses are calmed with the smell of vanilla and honey along with a warm spring breeze. When imbibed, you regain {@dice 4d8 + 4} {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, and the following conditions on you end: {@condition Blinded|XPHB}, {@condition Charmed|XPHB}, {@condition Deafened|XPHB}, {@condition Exhaustion|XPHB}, {@condition Frightened|XPHB}, {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB}, {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB}, {@condition Petrified|XPHB}, {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}, {@condition Stunned|XPHB}, {@condition Unconscious|XPHB}.
{@font {@style 48|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Sharp Mind
entries: When you drink this potion, your mind becomes charged with magical energy. For the next 8 hours, you gain a +2 bonus to Intelligence saving throws, and you have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Psychic damage. In addition, you can devour whole tomes of text, reading 10 times faster than normal.
{@font {@style 49|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Mind Over Might
entries: When consumed, this chalky elixir turns an intellectual scholar into an athlete. For the next 24 hours, you can use your Intelligence or Wisdom modifier (your choice), instead of your Strength or Dexterity modifier, when making Strength ({@skill Athletics|XPHB}) and Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics|XPHB}) checks. You also gain proficiency in the {@skill Acrobatics|XPHB} and {@skill Athletics|XPHB} skills for the duration, if you don't already have it.
{@font {@style 50|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Simulacrum Elixir
entries: When consumed, this numbing concoction lulls you into a deep sleep. By the time you wake up, your mind has taken over a perfect clone of yourself, which appears in a random location within 10 feet of you. The clone appears to be the same as you in every way, but it is formed without any equipment other than mundane clothes. The clone uses your game statistics at the time you consumed this potion, except it is a Construct, its {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} maximum is half as much, and it can't cast the {@spell Simulacrum|XPHB} spell or be affected by another Simulacrum Elixir. The clone can't gain levels, and it can't take {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB|Long Rests}. While the clone exists, your original body is in a state of suspended animation; it has the {@condition Unconscious|XPHB} condition (even if you would normally have {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to that condition), doesn't age, and doesn't need food, water, or air. The clone lasts until you dismiss it (no action required) or it drops to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, at which point it disappears in a cloud of butterflies. When it disappears, your mind returns to your original body.
{@font {@style 51|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Hidden Hand
entries: When consumed, this grainy potion heightens your senses and gives you a feeling of untapped strength. For the next 24 hours, you gain telekinetic powers as if you were under the effects of the {@spell Telekinesis|XPHB} spell.
{@font {@style 52|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Last Resort
entries: When this potion is downed, a crystalline cocoon begins forming around you. The cocoon becomes fully formed at the start of your next turn, and you can't be communicated or interacted with in any way while inside it. The cocoon has {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to all damage, and it can't be moved or destroyed by any means short of a {@spell Wish|XPHB} spell. While in the cocoon, you are in a state of suspended animation; you have the {@condition Unconscious|XPHB} condition (even if you would normally have {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to that condition), don't age, and don't need food, water, or air. The cocoon lasts between 1 hour and 4 decades. Roll on the table below to determine the measurement of time for the effect, from hours to decades. Then roll a {@dice d4} to determine the exact amount of time the cocoon exists.
{@font {@style 53|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Elixir of Echoes
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain the ability to cast a spell of your choice that was recently cast by another creature near you. The spell has to have been cast within 100 feet of you, and you must be aware that it was cast. You can cast the copied spell once within the next minute without expending a spell slot or needing Material components. If the spell requires a saving throw or an attack roll, it uses the save DC and attack bonus of the creature that originally cast the spell.
{@font {@style 54|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Blessing of the Moon Spirit
entries: After drinking this potion, which glows like a full moon, you gain a strange and wondrous affinity for lunar light. Your {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} maximum increases by {@dice 2d10}. In addition, while in moonlight, you can take a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} to spend up to three {@variantrule Hit Point Dice|XPHB|Hit Dice}, regaining {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} as if you finished a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB}. Once you spend {@variantrule Hit Point Dice|XPHB|Hit Dice} in this way, you can't do so again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. The effects of this potion are {@b Permanent}.
{@font {@style 55|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Bowark's Bombastic Beer
entries: This potion was discovered by accident by the great brewmaster, Bowark. Unsealing it fills the room with a strong scent of hops and yeasty goodness. When consumed, this beer gives you a warm, euphoric calm that makes you feel like everything will be alright. Until this potion's effects end, you can choose to reroll any {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB} you make. Once you have rerolled a {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB} in this way 7 times, the effects of this potion end.
{@font {@style 56|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Unified Might
entries: When consumed, this potion produces a burning sensation that fills your body, leaving you with newfound intellectual and physical strength. For the next hour, two ability scores of your choice increase to 25.
{@font {@style 57|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Umi's Powerful Undertow
entries: This potent elixir allows the drinker to enhance their aquatic spells with the ocean's wrath. For the next hour, when you cast a spell that produces or manipulates water in some way, the spell is cast as if using a spell slot of one level higher. Additionally, spells that use water to deal damage to a creature or an object deal an extra {@damage 2d12} Bludgeoning damage. Instead of drinking the potion, you can throw it into an unoccupied space within 30 feet of you, breaking the glass and summoning three {@creature Water Elemental|XMM|Water Elementals} in the nearest unoccupied spaces. These creatures are under your control until destroyed.
{@font {@style 58|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Island Nectar
entries: Consuming this sweet potion gives you a calming sensation before reinvigorating your life force and pushing you into action. You immediately regain 100 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. As part of the same {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} to consume this potion, you can also make a melee attack with a weapon or an {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|XPHB}, cast a spell with a casting time of an action that targets only one creature or object, or move up to your {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}.
{@font {@style 59|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Elixir of Omnimind
entries: This pale blue potion smells like ozone. When you drink it, your mind expands, and you gain a brief but exceptional capacity to comprehend the vast complexities of the arcane. For the next minute, you can concentrate on two spells or other effects at the same time. If you are forced to make a Constitution saving throw to maintain {@status Concentration|XPHB}, you must make a separate saving throw for each spell or effect.
{@font {@style 60|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Melodious Bird Calls
entries: When you drink this frothy liquid, you can perfectly mimic the call of any songbird for 24 hours.
{@font {@style 1|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Protected Thoughts
entries: When you drink this gritty potion, a 1-foot-diameter bubble emerges from the top of your head. The bubble lasts for 1 hour and moves with you, remaining centered on you. Until this effect ends, you can choose to project your thoughts into the bubble where they manifest as illusory but silent words or images (your choice), which anyone can see.
{@font {@style 2|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Intoxicating Aroma
entries: When consumed, you smell of an expertly crafted perfume. The effects of this potion last for 22 years, unless removed as if it were a curse. Drinking another potion doesn't negate this potion's effects, and this potion doesn't count toward the number of potions you have consumed for the purpose of {@variantrule Potion Sickness & Mishaps|ObojimaTallGrass24|Potion Sickness}.
{@font {@style 3|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Ladybug Kinship
entries: When opened, this potion quickly evaporates over the course of 1 minute. While evaporating, ladybugs fly out of the bottle at a rate of 500 per round.
{@font {@style 4|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Essence of Umami
entries: This potion makes everything taste amazing. When you pour it on any food, no matter if it's a hunk of tofu or a slab of slow-roasted brisket, Essence of Umami makes it glow with magic. When the food is tasted, it gives the taster their own personal version of the ultimate culinary experience.
{@font {@style 5|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Vocal Stranger
entries: Once imbibed, you can perfectly mimic the speech of a person you're not familiar with for the next hour. If you can't think of a person you've never met, you instead mimic a random voice.
{@font {@style 6|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Beard Brew
entries: Drinking this fuzzy liquid gives the sensation of wool rubbing against your entire body. When consumed, you instantly grow facial hair, even if you would not normally be able to do so. The style of facial hair is random, and it stays on your face until shaved off. Drinking another potion doesn't negate this potion's effects, and this potion doesn't count toward the number of potions you have consumed for the purpose of {@variantrule Potion Sickness & Mishaps|ObojimaTallGrass24|Potion Sickness}.
{@font {@style 7|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Photosynthetic Skin
entries: This vibrant green potion tastes like freshly cut grass. For the next 24 hours, you regain 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} at the start of every hour that you spend in sunlight.
{@font {@style 8|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Paradise Plumage
entries: After drinking this potion, you are adorned with striking and distinctive plumage. You can control the plumage to create dazzling displays of shimmering feathers, iridescent colors, and stunning patterns. While doing so, you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Charisma ({@skill Performance|XPHB}) checks made to distract or amaze. The effects of this potion last for 24 hours, unless removed as if it were a curse.
{@font {@style 9|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Musical Mixer
entries: When opened, this silvery elixir evaporates over the course of 1 hour. While evaporating, it produces beautiful, ethereal music.
{@font {@style 10|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Stink Brew
entries: After drinking this potion, you stink for {@dice 1d4} rounds. Until this effect ends, any creature (other than you) that starts its turn in a 15-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from you must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be unable to willingly move closer to you for the duration. A creature that succeeds on this save is immune to the effect for the duration.
{@font {@style 11|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Duko the Trickster's Elixir
entries: This potion is easily mistaken for brackish water. At any point after drinking it, you can produce one of the following objects from your mouth (no action required): a coin, an egg, a rock, or a 2-foot-long string. The effects of this potion end after you produce an object in this way. Drinking another potion doesn't negate this potion's effects, and this potion doesn't count toward the number of potions you have consumed for the purpose of {@variantrule Potion Sickness & Mishaps|ObojimaTallGrass24|Potion Sickness}.
{@font {@style 12|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Manifested Nostalgia
entries: After consuming this clear and flavorless potion, you quickly undergo a radical transformation, becoming the child version of yourself. While transformed, you are one size smaller (to a minimum of Small), and your Strength and Dexterity scores are 10 unless those scores were already lower. The effects of this potion last for 4 hours, unless removed as if it were a curse.
{@font {@style 13|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Pigment
entries: When consumed, this multicolored potion allows you to produce a variety of oil paints from the tips of your fingers for the next 8 hours. For the duration, you can change the color of the paints at will, and they never seem to run out.
{@font {@style 14|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Audio Oddity
entries: When opened, this embarrassing and noisy potion sounds like a man sobbing. For 1 hour after consuming it, the sounds produced by any spell you cast are muted.
{@font {@style 15|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Hindsight
entries: A well-known potion among investigators and merchants, this thick brew acquires special insight on an object when poured over it. The only downside is that you must then lick the brew off the object to obtain any of this information. When poured and then licked off, you learn a minor but useful bit of information about the object.
{@font {@style 16|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Super Singing
entries: When consumed, this potion tastes as if it were a freshly brewed tea with the perfect amount of honey mixed in. You are unable to speak without singing, and you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Charisma ({@skill Performance|XPHB}) checks using your voice. The effects of this potion last for 1 hour, unless removed as if it were a curse.
{@font {@style 17|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Fluffplum Tonic
entries: This nearly weightless liquid grants to drinkers the attributes of a dandelion, allowing them to float safely to the ground when falling and be easily carried by the wind. For the next hour, you are under the effects of the {@spell Feather Fall|XPHB} spell and weigh no more than 1 pound.
{@font {@style 18|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Merriment
entries: Is this just booze? After drinking this potion, you become incredibly intoxicated and gain {@variantrule Expertise|XPHB} in a skill of your choice. You also have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on all ability checks you make that don't use the chosen skill. The effects of this potion last for 1 hour, unless removed as if it were a curse.
{@font {@style 19|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Bubble Message
entries: As part of the {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} to consume this potion, you speak a message and hiccup a bubble, which magically contains your message inside it. You then describe a creature you are familiar with and the bubble floats to that creature, traveling at a speed of 1 mile per hour, and then pops. The bubble pops early if it takes any damage. When the bubble pops, it releases the contained message in your voice.
{@font {@style 20|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Crystal Clear
entries: This aqua-blue potion feels cold to the touch and raises the hairs on your arm when opened. When poured into a nonmagical liquid, that liquid is {@condition invisible} for {@dice 1d4} hours. If the liquid the potion is poured into is larger than a 20-foot {@variantrule Cube [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cube}, this magic has no effect.
{@font {@style 21|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Elder Elixir
entries: This unassuming potion temporarily doubles your age when consumed. The effects of this potion last for {@dice 1d12} months. Drinking another potion doesn't negate this potion's effects, and this potion doesn't count toward the number of potions you have consumed for the purpose of {@variantrule Potion Sickness & Mishaps|ObojimaTallGrass24|Potion Sickness}.
{@font {@style 22|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Witch's Hidden Gem
entries: This bland and underwhelming-looking potion coats your mouth and gullet as you drink it, leaving a thin film. For the next hour, all liquid you consume turns into wine as you drink it.
{@font {@style 23|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Carbonated Snake
entries: When shaken and pointed in a direction, the contents of this zippy elixir shoot out of the bottle, turning into a {@creature Venomous Snake|XMM} midair and landing in a space within 10 feet of you.
{@font {@style 24|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Shadow Child
entries: Upon drinking this potion, you are filled with intense feelings of confusion before an apparition emerges from your body. The apparition resembles a young girl with onyx skin, black hair, and piercing green eyes. Only you can see the apparition, and it can't speak. It functions as the Unseen Servant* spell and lasts for 1 hour.
{@font {@style 25|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Hsirebbig
entries: Drinking this bitter potion grants you a special form of nonsensical speech you can use for the next 24 hours. This speech sounds like absolute gibberish to anyone who isn't also under the effects of a Hsirebbig potion. Even magic like the {@spell Comprehend Languages|XPHB} spell fails to decipher this speech.
{@font {@style 26|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Sky Swimming
entries: After drinking this potion, you feel the sudden and unpleasant feeling of wearing soaking-wet clothing. For the next 10 minutes, you gain a {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} of 15 feet and can hover, but it looks and feels as if you're swimming through the sky. While flying in this way, you are subjected to the rules for Underwater Combat.
{@font {@style 27|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Passing Memory
entries: When this powerful elixir is brewed, the creator chooses one of its memories, imbuing it within this powerful elixir. When consumed, you gain the stored memory.
{@font {@style 28|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Bottled Slime
entries: This mischievous little slime can sometimes form in place of a potion. If noticed before being consumed, you can throw the bottle to an unoccupied space within 30 feet of you, releasing a {@creature Soda Slime|ObojimaTallGrass24} in the space where it shatters.
{@font {@style 29|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Oil of the Trademark Flourish
entries: When you apply this oil to an object, you assign a signature sound that accompanies the object when it's used. The effects of this potion are {@b Permanent}, unless removed as if it were a curse.
{@font {@style 30|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Mosspot
entries: After drinking this earthy mixture, your form quickly shifts and shrinks. You immediately transform into a {@creature Mosslings|ObojimaTallGrass24|Mossling}, as if by the {@spell Polymorph|XPHB} spell. This effect doesn't require {@status Concentration|XPHB} and lasts for 1 hour or until you dismiss it (no action required).
{@font {@style 31|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Incredible Luck
entries: After drinking this wonderful liquid, your spirits lift and optimistic feelings pour over you. You have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on the next {@dice 1d4} {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB|D20 Tests} you make.
{@font {@style 32|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Grand Friendship
entries: This golden elixir can be divided evenly among up to eight creatures. When consumed, the creatures that partook gain a conditional ability to fly. For the next 24 hours, those creatures gain a {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} of 60 feet, but only while all the creatures that partook are holding hands.
{@font {@style 33|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Witch's Lament
entries: When thrown at a creature you can see within 60 feet of you, the target must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a rain cloud appears over the target. Then in a flash of lightning, its head takes on the form of an anthropomorphic animal chosen by the GM. The effects of this potion last for 24 hours, unless removed by a spell of level 5 or higher as if it were a curse.
{@font {@style 34|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Spirit Appendage
entries: This bitter, unappealing elixir turns your stomach and is often a fight to keep down your gullet. Once consumed, you grow a 6-foot-long prehensile tail, which takes a form decided by the GM. The tail can be used as if it were a third arm and can easily support your own weight. The tail lasts for {@dice 1d12} days before falling off. Drinking another potion doesn't negate this potion's effects, and this potion doesn't count toward the number of potions you have consumed for the purpose of {@variantrule Potion Sickness & Mishaps|ObojimaTallGrass24|Potion Sickness}.
{@font {@style 35|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Move-a-Thing
entries: When this potion is poured over an object that weighs 500 pounds or less, the object begins to get lighter and lighter. The object's weight decreases by {@dice 1d100} pounds at the start of every hour, to a minimum weight of 10 pounds. Its weight remains at 10 pounds for 7 days, after which the effects of this potion end.
{@font {@style 36|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Gobble Gunk
entries: This unappealing potion allows you to eat whatever you can fit in your mouth with no ill effects—metal, poison, seawater: you name it, you can eat it. The effects of this potion last 1 hour. Any magical objects consumed in this way are hurled back up when this effect ends.
{@font {@style 37|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Pocket Portal
entries: When this potion is buried and left to sit for 24 hours, its contents sprout and form a temporary portal to the Spirit Realm from knotted roots and mud. The portal stays open for 24 hours before closing.
{@font {@style 38|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Don't Eat Dirt
entries: When consumed, this viscous brew tastes like wet soil. For the next 10 days, you have {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. Whenever you would have the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition, even if you attempt to give it to yourself, you instead remain upright as if an imperceptible force kept you that way.
{@font {@style 39|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Lunar Elixir
entries: When poured out, this silvery liquid rapidly expands and coats the surrounding area, creating a chalky white sheen across everything it touches. For the next 8 hours, gravity in a 20-foot-radius, 300-foot-high {@variantrule Cylinder [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cylinder} centered on the point where the potion was poured is like the moon's gravity. The jump distance for all creatures inside the {@variantrule Cylinder [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cylinder} is tripled, and damage from falling inside the {@variantrule Cylinder [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cylinder} is halved.
{@font {@style 40|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Lifetime Supply
entries: When consumed, this potion causes your hair to grow at an accelerated rate. Roll {@dice 1d4 + 2} and multiply the result by 100 to determine how many feet of hair you grow. After 1 minute, the potion wears off and all your hair falls out.
{@font {@style 41|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Invisible Tonic
entries: Once poured over an object that is Small or smaller, the object has the {@condition Invisible|XPHB} condition. The effects of this potion are {@b Permanent}, unless removed by a spell of level 5 or higher as if it were a curse.
{@font {@style 42|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Liquid Disguise
entries: When brewed, this potion takes on the essence of a random Humanoid within 1 mile. When consumed, you take on the visage of that Humanoid. The effects of this potion last for 24 hours, unless removed as if it were a curse.
{@font {@style 43|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Spirit Sweets
entries: This bitter concoction tastes and smells horrible to physical beings, yet couldn't taste more delicious to Spirits, many of which would trade quite a bit for a sip of the brew. A Spirit with a {@variantrule Challenge Rating|XPHB} of 8 or lower that consumes this potion becomes drunk and happy for {@dice 1d4} days. Alternatively, you can pour the potion out to attract nearby Spirits. When used in this way, Spirits within 1 mile of the potion that have a {@variantrule Challenge Rating|XPHB} of 2 or lower are attracted to it for the next 8 hours or until the potion is consumed or otherwise destroyed.
{@font {@style 44|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: A New Look
entries: When imbibed, this unassuming elixir transforms your head into a random anthropomorphic animal, such as a horse, panda, pig, or raccoon. The effects of this potion are {@b Permanent}, unless removed by a spell of level 5 or higher as if it were a curse.
{@font {@style 45|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Shadow Puppet
entries: Once consumed, this potion gives sentience to your shadow. The shadow starts to act independently of you but is still bound to your body. It has its own emotions and personality, but can't interact with the world in any way beyond what a normal shadow could. The effects of this potion are {@b Permanent}, unless removed by a spell of level 5 or higher as if it were a curse.
{@font {@style 46|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Object Embodiment
entries: When you drink this metallic potion, your body twists and transforms into an object of your choice, as if by the {@spell True Polymorph|XPHB} spell. This effect doesn't require {@status Concentration|XPHB} and lasts for 1 hour.
{@font {@style 47|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Phoenix Elixir
entries: When imbibed, this elixir burns your throat and ignites an ember within you. For 24 hours, you have {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to Fire damage. When the potion's magic finally fades, the fire inside you burns intensely from within, consuming you in flames and turning your body to ash. After 1 hour, you appear in the nearest bonfire, born anew. All equipment you were wearing or carrying when you turned to ash is left by your original body.
{@font {@style 48|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Unknown Elixir
entries: This bizarre blend of flavors reminds you of freshly cut grass, petroleum jelly, and honey. When consumed, it sits in your stomach like a rock and slowly swells in power. You gain the ability to cast one random spell of level 6 or lower without expending a spell slot. This spell uses a spell save DC of 17 and a spell attack bonus of +9. The effects of this potion last until the spell is cast. Drinking another potion doesn't negate this potion's effects, and this potion doesn't count toward the number of potions you have consumed for the purpose of {@variantrule Potion Sickness & Mishaps|ObojimaTallGrass24|Potion Sickness}.
{@font {@style 49|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Illusion in a Bottle
entries: When poured out, an illusion of your choice appears in the potion's space, as if by the {@spell Major Image|XPHB} spell (save DC 18). The illusion lasts 1 hour.
{@font {@style 50|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Homegrown
entries: When poured over a surface that is at least a 50-foot square and isn't obstructed by obstacles (such as trees or boulders), this pungent liquid begins to quickly foam and expand. After 1 minute, a newly formed and fully furnished home of grand size appears in the space.
{@font {@style 51|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Mind Transfer
entries: When imbibed, this acrid elixir loosens your soul from your body and prepares it for transfer. The first time you are touched by a creature after consuming this potion, your mind and soul transfer into that creature's body. While inhabiting the target's body, you can force it to make an Intelligence or Wisdom check against your Intelligence or Wisdom check (you both choose which ability to use) at the start of each of the target's turns. If you succeed, you gain total control over the target until the start of its next turn. While your mind and soul are away, your body is left behind in a state of suspended animation; it has the {@condition Unconscious|XPHB} condition (even if you would normally have {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to that condition), doesn't age, and doesn't need food, water, or air. If the target dies while your mind and soul are still inside it, you also die. You inhabit the target's body for 1 hour, until you dismiss the effect as a {@action Magic|XPHB} action, or until the target is subjected to an effect that ends possession (such as the {@spell Dispel Evil and Good|XPHB} spell).
{@font {@style 52|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: New Life
entries: When this potion is brewed, the creator chooses the likeness of a Humanoid it is familiar with. When imbibed, you take on the illusionary form of the chosen creature. This illusory disguise is perfect in every way and matches both the creature's appearance and its voice. This disguise can only be discerned by a creature with the ability to detect magic or see through illusions (as with {@sense Truesight|XPHB}). The effects of this potion last for 7 years, unless removed by a spell of level 7 or higher as if it were a curse. Drinking another potion doesn't negate this potion's effects, and this potion doesn't count toward the number of potions you have consumed for the purpose of {@variantrule Potion Sickness & Mishaps|ObojimaTallGrass24|Potion Sickness}.
{@font {@style 53|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Ups-A-Daisy
entries: When poured over a creature or object, this creamy elixir instantly awakens the target, as if by the {@spell Awaken|XPHB} spell. The awakened target has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition for 1 year instead of 30 days.
{@font {@style 54|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Spiritual Rebuke
entries: When poured, this dark elixir stains the earth and creates a 10-foot {@variantrule Cube [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cube} that is void of the island's magic, as if it were under the effects of the {@spell Antimagic Field|XPHB} spell. This effect lasts for 1 year.
{@font {@style 55|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Newly Found Magic
entries: When consumed, you feel a rush of magical inspiration flow through you, granting you access to a random level 3 spell, which you always have prepared. You can cast it without expending a spell slot, and once you do so, you can't cast it in this way again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. The effects of this potion are {@b Permanent}.
{@font {@style 56|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Crafter's Brew
entries: When poured into a container of water or a small body of water, this potion creates an enchanting bath. The first nonmagical object submerged in the water for at least 1 minute permanently becomes a magic item. It gains a random magical property that is powerful enough for the item's rarity to be Uncommon or higher.
{@font {@style 57|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Dancing Feet
entries: After drinking this potion, you no longer walk or run—now you dance. Going from one place to another is no longer a mundane trudge, a shuffling expression of ennui. How you get from point A to point B is now a dazzling performance. From smooth, elven waltzes to nakadama hops and gyrations to the interpretive dance forms of the dara, you explore them all. Your stylish moves increase your {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} by 10 feet, give you a +5 bonus to Charisma ({@skill Performance|XPHB}) checks that involve dancing, and grant you proficiency in Dexterity saving throws if you don't already have it. The effects of this potion last until you dismiss them as a {@action Magic|XPHB} action.
{@font {@style 58|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Chicken Chaser
entries: When you drink this potion, your hair turns dark red (if you have any), and you gain the ability to speak with chickens, as if by the {@spell Speak with Animals|XPHB} spell. Additionally, you can crow a sacred and thunderous cackle that summons 100 chickens in a 20-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from you. These chickens appear running from a distance, digging out from the ground below, and falling from the sky in a veritable tsunami of flapping, clucking poultry. Each creature in the area (other than you) must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 30d6} Slashing damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. Once you've summoned the chickens in this way, you can't do so again. The effects of this potion are {@b Permanent}.
{@font {@style 59|large}|SneakerProMedium}

item.name: Disappearing Act
entries: When consumed, your body vanishes along with all the equipment you were wearing or carrying, and your sentience is transferred into a random object within 100 miles of you.
